ygData.subject: Newbie help....
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all..!  this is my first post and well I am hoping you all can help me here.  I have never wanted to play anything but my druid until just recently I was
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all..! this is my first post and well I am hoping you all can help
me here. I have never wanted to play anything but my druid until just
recently I was grouped with a monk...and omg he kicked ass. I have
shyed away from melee classes since I thought they would be boring but
after doing some research on monks in general sounds like they get new
skills all the time and can be fun to play...So I made me a little monk
newbie. Now I guess after all my babbling I am on to what I need to
know here. First of all...equipment. What kind of equipment should I
be looking for...like boots and gloves. I am ashamed to admit it but I
am a twink and would readily buy what ever I need for my monk...so tell
me what should I be looking for....for just good basic stuff. Right
now she is pretty decked out in mesh with a few things extras like a
bracer of errolsi and some silver +agi rings that I had laying around.
What I don't have for her is boots or gloves and I have fought
countless nights in guk looking for mesh gloves....to no avail. Can
anyone tell me where to get something that will work in their place and
what kind of boots I should be looking for. Anyway sorry for
babbling...any advice is useful here though!

Leiah
e'ci
